name: Gothic (itch)
description:
This game is a very early prototype!Controls: WASD - camera movement
TAB - toggle chat window
Cursor Keys - aim the currently selected turret
Spacebar - fire currently selected turret once
Units: Keep you only get one, stores 1000 coins and up to 50 population, generates 5 coins a second
Farm costs 100coins, generates 10 coins a second and raises population by 5
Tower costs 250 coins, has 500 hp and is very tall
Wall costs 100 coins has 250 hp and is not as tall as a tower
Mangonel costs 500 coins and 5 population, shoots projectiles which deal 50 damage at a fire rate of 20 rpm (pretty good for a catapult!)
